title: sokani
author: sokani
content: QuoteOur mission at Kingdom Coin is to create a decentralized digital currency that serves as a legal tender for the Christian community. Our goal is to leverage the power of blockchain technology to provide secure and reliable financial transactions to support our community’s needs. We aim to use Kingdom Coin to provide monetary aid to missionaries in rural areas, build shelters for the homeless, and sponsor missionaries and provide a standard System that satisfies every financial Kingdom’s needs. Nigerian Abuja-based church House of Salem International Ministries don launch their own cryptocurrency called kingdom coin on de 1st of May, 2023. According to dem, kingdom coin na decentralized blockchain with many integrated features like web-3 wallet, P2P trading, launchpad, staking and fiat banking features. Kingdom coin don also promise to sponsor kingdom projects like support missionaries, build shelters, do charity and even sponsor outreaches and crusades.Like this dem don already list de coin and trading don start for pancakeswap.... My country people how una see this mata dis wan wey our own church don dey put hand for cryptocurrency?https://guardian.ng/news/church-launches-kingdom-coin/
